name: Black Hole (itch) (PavkataProds)
description:
A 3D game, made by 2 optimists. It has a story, the well-known for most gamers "Butterfly effect", realistic graphics and a bunch of controls.

Used programs:

  • Unity Engine
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • C#
  • Visual Studio
  • Blender
  • Adobe Illustrator

Gameplay: You are a spaceman, that has a simple job in the Space, but turns out that is not actually that easy. Find out what happens by yourself! :) 

Give us a feedback, if you found it interesting or you think it has to be updated someway.
